DOC.brief_summary: Test bioequivalence generic tacrolimus ( Tacni ) , use original tacrolimus ( Prograf ) comparator , elderly ( > 60 yr ) renal transplant recipient
DOC.brief_title: Generic Tacrolimus Elderly - Prograf® v Tacni®
DOC.detailed_description: 12-hour pharmacokinetic investigation perform formulation patient steady-state . Patients randomized regard formulation start . 1-2 week PK investigation .
DOC.criteria: Renal transplant recipient receive Tac part immunosuppressive therapy . Recipients 60 year age old . Signed informed consent . Diabetes mellitus ( WHO criteria ) . Concomitant treatment : diltiazem , verapamil , phenytoin , carbamazepin , fluconazole , ketoconazole , voriconazole , erythromycin , clarithromycin .
